CustomField.formula: "IC" + RIGHT( ( LEFT( TEXT( Year__c ) , 4)) , 2) + "-" + RIGHT( TEXT( Year__c ) , 2) + "-" + TEXT( Quarter__c ) + "-" + Course__r.Course_Code__c + LEFT(TEXT( Batch_Type__c ),1) + RIGHT( Batch_AutoNum__c , 3) + "-" + RIGHT( TEXT(Batch_Timing__c ) , 3)
CustomField.label: Batch Code
